templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://www.drschollsshoes.com/sale?icid=DRS_2023_TopNav_Header_Text_SALE_PLP-AllSale_NonPromo#sort=%40newarrivalenddate%20descending

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that but if it helps, you can check out the items we have on sale here: https://www.drschollsshoes.com/sale?icid=TopNav_MMTile_Sale_promo_HOLIYAY_Upto70OffSale_2022_FW22_Wk45

templates.name: Does the Original Collection feature toe grips?
templates.content: Due to reviews regarding comfort, we removed the metatarsal toe grip about 15 years ago. We found that without it, the shoe has a more comfortable fit.

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: We don't currently have a store but definitely keep an eye out.

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to contact us via this link: https://drschollshoes.custhelp.com/app/ask/ Our team is happy to chat!

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.drschollsshoes.com/help/returns-and-exchanges?icid=Footer_Help_Returns

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/drschollsshoes/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/drschollsshoes

templates.name: Sizing
templates.content: Happy to help you find the right size! I'd recommend taking a look at our size chart on each product page as well as the additional information noted in the description of each item. If you're still unsure, just let me know!

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at 1-800-558-7614 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to contact us via this link: https://drschollshoes.custhelp.com/app/ask/ Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free economy shipping on domestic orders over $65. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Our processing time takes 3 business days and we usually ship via USPS and FedEx. Once shipped, it will take 5-9 business days for domestic orders.

templates.name: How do I start a return?
templates.content: You can start your return here: https://drschollsshoes.happyreturns.com/

templates.name: Do you ship to APO/FPO addresses?
templates.content: I'm afraid we cannot deliver to military APO/FPO addresses.

templates.name: When will I receive my refund?
templates.content: For returns made via our Happy Returns Bar, the refund will be initiated immediately. For returns via mail using our pre-printed label a fee of $7 will be applied to your refund. It may take up to 3 weeks to process your return, and you'll receive a notification if your return is approved.

templates.name: Do you ship to PO Boxes?
templates.content: We're happy to offer economy shipping to P.O. boxes. Ground and expedited shipping options to P.O. boxes are not available at this time.

templates.name: Can you apply the code retroactively?
templates.content: I'm afraid we can't make any changes after the order has been placed, but you can use the code on the next purchase as this one won't expire.

templates.name: Escalation template
templates.content: Can I have your full name, email, order number, phone number and your zip code please?

templates.name: Cancel/edit order
templates.content: To better serve you, orders are processed and shipped very quickly, therefore, we're unable to edit orders once they begin to process. If you wish to cancel, I can check if that's possible. Can I have your email address and order number please?

templates.name: Order update / status / tracking
templates.content: You can use our convenient online tool to see the latest updates on your order: https://www.drschollsshoes.com/track-order?icid=Footer_Help_TrackOrder

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss this is to contact us via this link: https://drschollshoes.custhelp.com/app/ask/ Our team is happy to chat!

templates.name: Size Chart: All - Clothes
templates.content: You can take a look at our size chart here: https://www.drschollsshoes.com/help/fit-assist
